message.content:
cs.SE, cs.AR, cs.PF, cs.PL, cs.DC 

The paper discusses sustainable software practices for rewriting large physics codes to perform well on new architectures such as many-core, GPU, and Intel MIC. This involves software engineering (cs.SE) and architecture (cs.AR) considerations. The paper also mentions specific advantages of sustainable practices for future architectures, which could fall under performance (cs.PF), programming languages (cs.PL), and distributed, parallel, and cluster computing (cs.DC).
